name: SunShine Ra
text:
2 "SunShine" monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can activate the effects of "SunShine" cards in your GY as Quick Effects until the end of your opponent's next turn. If this card is sent to the GY: You can banish this card; draw 1 card, then discard 1 card. If this card is in the GY, except the turn it was sent there: You can banish this card; add 1 "SunShine" monster from your banished zone to your hand. You can only use each effect of "SunShine Ra" once per turn.
